welcome:
Welcome to Codinomes!!
Choose your language
questions:
Have questions? Check out /help

Play or report bugs in our official group as well @CodinomesGrupo

already_exists: There's already a game going on in this group
try_official_group: Consider starting a game in our official group @CodinomesGrupo to find fellow players!
master_occupied: This team already have a master
sure_skip: Do you really want to skip?

suggestion: Remember that you can choose a default /color to be automatically applied when you enter a game

admin_only_info: Choose if only group admins can change settings, stop games, etc
compound_words_info: Allows compound word (with space or hyphen) as hints
timer_info: Choose how long players can take to make their play

user_not_registered: DM the bot to gain access to that
master_not_registered: I don't have access to masters dm to send them the image
already_playing: You're already playing in another group
admin_only: Only group admins can do that
no_required_players: The game needs at least a player for each role to get started
only_oficial_groups:
For now, the bot is undergoing testing and therefore is only functioning in official groups

Join @CodinomesGrupo to play
wrong_hint_format_desc: A single word up to 16 characters + number of cards which this hint refers to. Examples: Fear 2, 3 Shiny...
wrong_guess_format_desc: Just enter the first letters of the word and it will appear right here
color_taken: Color already taken by the other team
master_only: Only the master can do that
no_enough_cards: There's no enough cards in the actived packs to start the game
no_packs: There are no selected word packs, choose them in /settings and feel free to create your own packs by sending /packs as a dm to the bot
must_be_supergroup: This bot only works in supergroups (changing an admin's role name is enough to transform a group into a supergroup, after that send /start)

base:
*Codinomes* is a word guessing game, based on hints, divided into two Teams of different colors made up of a Master and several Agents\.

The team that finds all cards of their own color first wins\.

• Roles: /help\_roles
• Hints: /help\_hints
• Colors: /help\_colors

• Commands: /help\_commands

Note: At the moment the bot is only available in the group @CodinomesGrupo
hints:
Hints must be a single word followed by the number of cards that are related to that clue\.

*Example: EVEREST 3*
*Words:* SNOW, COLD and MOUNTAIN

Your agents can try to guess up to the number of the current hint \+ 1 extra card\.

*Infinity Hint ∞:* If you need your agents to try more cards than this, you can submit your hint without the number and it will become an Infinity Hint\. They can try as many cards as they want until they make a wrong guess, but they won't know how many words relate to the current hint\.

*Zero Hint 0:* You can also submit a hint with the number 0\. It also has infinite attempts, but it serves to give hint on which cards your agents should avoid\.
commands:
*Codinomes Commands:*

• /new creates a new game lobby
• /skip skip your turn in the game
• /stop interrupts and cancels the match

• /notify send it to a group to be notified whenever a new match takes place in it, send it again to cancel

• /history view the history of hints and attempts from the match, it also works via DM

• /settings group settings \(as timer and word packs\)

• /color choose your default color that will be set automatically when you enter as a master

• /packs send it to DM to create and manage your own word packages

seven_one_info: Reach the 7\-1 score in a match
good_start_info: Flip a black card on the first try
day_is_night_info: Flip the black card missing one card to win the game
impostor_info: Flip the opponent's last card, leading them to victory
rainbow: At the End of the Rainbow
making_friends_info: Play a match in the official group
kian_knows_info: Play a match with the developer
